title: Point access (approach by dead end road) to a plot shall be considered for the minimum road width requirement mentioned in above table
clause_text: Point access (approach by dead end road) to a plot shall be considered for the minimum road width requirement mentioned in above table. In such case, front margin shall be applicable for the width of point access road.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
